name: Chital Bowl M
description: The Chital Bowl with its amorphous shape is both beautiful and functional. Available in 3 other sizes and different finishes. Currently made to order 5-6 weeks. Handmade; Shagreen & Pen Shell & Bronze-Patina Brass; Wipe clean with soft dry cloth; Made in Philippines. Although inspired by her parents, Kifu's collection of Home Accessories and Furniture is a distinct identity of its own. All shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight, color variants may occur on the stingray and other exotic finishes, showcasing the Parisian label's commitment to creating authentic luxurious products using natural components.
